Tucson nods in assurance.

" Just as I suspected.  Completely Alien.  Thank=
 you Hydras, I am going to bring Noctorro back to the Ark for repairs, and =
I will then carry out the rest of my investigation with Talon.  As soon as =
we find anything we will notify you."

He turns to Talon, with a heavy sigh=
.

" I'm not so sure if Rodimus will be able to recover his leadership afte=
r this round of repossession.  He's far too vulnerable to attack."

Perpetu=
ally on the move and constantly busy.
